summary: Diff implements a local demo credential store (phone+password), adds a new /signup route and SignUp page, extends session handling with a password session type, updates route guarding to accept local sessions, and updates DesignBAppShell to hide navigation on /signup. SignIn is updated to include password sign-in while retaining existing options per file summary, but some UI details are truncated so a few AC items cannot be fully verified from shown code.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an account lookup helper (getAccount) in the demo credential store, which was not explicitly requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires create/persist + uniqueness + verify; it does not request an API to fetch an account record by phone number.

hallucinated_features.description: Added simulated network delays (setTimeout) around Sign Up (and likely Sign In flows), which was not requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention adding artificial delays; it is extra behavior beyond required validation and navigation.

hallucinated_features.description: Added country code selection UI for phone numbers on Sign Up/Sign In.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires collecting a Phone Number but does not request a country code selector; this expands the UX surface area.
